designLanguage: Clean and minimal with an emphasis on typography and whitespace. The color palette uses deep, natural tones that convey trust and professionalism. Components maintain consistent spacing and interaction patterns.

components.name: Button
components.description: Buttons communicate actions users can take. They can be filled, outlined or text-only.

components.name: Card
components.description: Cards group related information and actions. They have consistent padding and optional shadows.

components.name: Navigation
components.description: The main navigation provides consistent access to key sections and actions.
